channel.description: Recent content on Trepanning IO Blog Site

item.title: Docker != VM
item.description: Despite the growing use of containers over recent years there is still some confusion as to the difference between a container and a virtual machine. Most people understand they are both virtualization technologies but are a little hazy on the differences. The aim of this repo is to help clarify the difference. In a nutshell, the difference is a VM seperates the kernel, file system and networking stack from the host machine.
